/* * The MD4 algorithm was designed by Ron Rivest in 1990. * * http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc1186.txt * http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc1320.txt */
/* Implementation that should never be optimized out by the compiler */

function.name: mbedtls_zeroize
mbedtls_md4_free
mbedtls_md4_starts
mbedtls_md4_process
mbedtls_md4_update
function.parameter_list: ( mbedtls_md4_context *ctx, const unsigned char *input, size_t ilen )

function.name: mbedtls_md4_finish
mbedtls_md4
function.parameter_list: ( const unsigned char *input, size_t ilen, unsigned char output[16] )

function.name: mbedtls_md4_self_test
